pr_title: delete image only for domain in image tests

timeline.author: rjeberhard
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -76,11 +76,13 @@ protected  Domain createSitConfigDomain(boolean domainInImage, String domainScri
    *

timeline.bodyText: Actually, I'm not sure hiding this here helps.  The caller has the domain object and could just call domain.deleteImage().
timeline.author: rjeberhard

replies.bodyText: same goes for domain.destroy() also and don't even need this method destroySitConfigDomain(). I think the method was added here as there are two sit config test classes, so that they both inherit these methods.
replies.author: vanajamukkara

replies.bodyText: destroySitConfigDomain() not really doing much, I can put those two lines in the test class itself.
replies.author: vanajamukkara

timeline.message: delete image only for domain in image tests
moving the code to actual test class for delete domain
adding check not to delete container-registry images
